author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Slips Against Mexican, Canadian Currencies
text:
The Canadian dollar and Mexican peso rose against the dollar Monday, reflecting fresh optimism on trade negotiations with the U.S.
The dollar was recently down 0.1% against the Mexican peso to 18.03, its lowest level since late September. The U.S. currency was down 0.2% against the Canadian dollar to C$1.2577, hovering near a two-month low.
